title: Design and Operation of Online Educational Escape Rooms (EER) for Strengthening STEM Education

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic science and mathematics concepts, proficiency in digital tool utilization
context.additional_context: Non-face-to-face education centered on group collaboration, accessible via smartphone-based online environments.

learning_goals: Learners can effectively apply teamwork and communication strategies in STEM problem-solving processes through Educational Escape Rooms (EER).
Learners can execute critical thinking and creative approaches to real-world science and engineering problems with over 80% accuracy through EER activities.
Learners can proactively manage 70% or more of the learning process using collaboration tools (e.g., chat, screen sharing) in digital platform-based EER.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
